    • getLeaderCardEffectDiscount

      public java.util.List<Resources> getLeaderCardEffectDiscount()
      This method returns the leaderCardEffectDiscount attribute
      Returns:
      a Resources list, that contains the resources that can be discounted when they buy a Development Card that requires that resource

    • getLeaderCardEffectWhiteMarble

      public java.util.List<Resources> getLeaderCardEffectWhiteMarble()
      This method returns the leaderCardEffectWhiteMarble attribute
      Returns:
      a Resources list, that contains the resources that can be added to the Warehouse depot or to the Strongbox when they take a White Marble from the Market
